Question_1.Context: The journal EJNMMI Radiopharmacy and Chemistry focuses on the development of new imaging and radionuclide-based therapeutic agents for application in nuclear medicine and molecular imaging.
Question_1.Question: What is the Impact Factor of EJNMMI Radiopharmacy and Chemistry for the year 2022?
Question_1.Source: The Impact Factor 2022 of EJNMMI Radiopharmacy and Chemistry is 4.6.

Question_2.Context: EJNMMI Radiopharmacy and Chemistry covers the content of new research in the field of radiopharmacy and radiochemistry.
Question_2.Question: What is the main focus of EJNMMI Radiopharmacy and Chemistry?
Question_2.B: Development of new imaging and therapeutic agents for nuclear medicine
Question_2.Source: The journal provides a platform for chemists, pharmacists, and basic scientists to present their views and scientific work in the field of development of new imaging and radionuclide-based therapeutic agents for application in nuclear medicine and molecular imaging.

Question_3.Context: The journal EJNMMI Radiopharmacy and Chemistry is interested in various topics related to radiopharmacy and radiochemistry.
Question_3.Question: Which of the following is an area of interest for EJNMMI Radiopharmacy and Chemistry based on recent developments?
Question_3.Source: Artificial Intelligence is emerging and found its application in the Radiopharmaceutical field.

Question_4.Context: EJNMMI Radiopharmacy and Chemistry aims to support the field by implementing novel methodologies.
Question_4.Question: What is the purpose of the collection open for submission dedicated to Best Practices?
Question_4.B: To hinder the implementation of novel methodologies
Question_4.C: To support the field in implementing novel methodologies
Question_4.D: To discourage the use of best practices
Question_4.Source: A collection is open for submission dedicated only to Best Practices in order to support the field in implementing novel methodologies.

Question_5.Context: The Editorial Board of EJNMMI Radiopharmacy and Chemistry consists of scientists in the field.
Question_5.Question: How many scientists are currently part of the Editorial Board?
Question_5.Source: The Editorial Board consists now of 80 scientists in the field and is continuously expanding.

Question_6.Context: EJNMMI Radiopharmacy and Chemistry is interested in providing insight into novel concepts.
Question_6.Question: What type of concepts does the journal aim to provide insight into?
Question_6.Source: The journal provides insight into novel concepts of imaging or radionuclide-based therapeutic agent applications of relevance for the whole molecular imaging community.

Question_7.Context: The journal EJNMMI Radiopharmacy and Chemistry is now interested in additional topics.
Question_7.Question: What is one of the new areas of interest for the journal?
Question_7.Source: The journal is now also interested in production methods for radionuclides.

Question_8.Context: EJNMMI Radiopharmacy and Chemistry aims to establish its role as a platform for communication.
Question_8.Question: What is the journal aiming to achieve in terms of its role?
Question_8.B: To establish a platform for communication
Question_8.Source: I hope to continue all the good work and aim that EJNMMI Radiopharmacy and Chemistry can further increase and establish its role being a strong platform for communication and publications in the field of Radiopharmacy and Radiochemistry.

Question_9.Context: EJNMMI Radiopharmacy and Chemistry encourages submissions from authors.
Question_9.Question: What is the Editor-in-Chief looking forward to receiving?
Question_9.Source: I am very much looking forward to receive your submissions to EJNMMI Radiopharmacy and Chemistry.

Question_10.Context: The journal EJNMMI Radiopharmacy and Chemistry provides online submission guidelines.
Question_10.Question: Where can additional metrics like downloads and turnaround times be found?
Question_10.Source: The online submission and the submission guidelines for the considered article types are available on the journal website.
